text: John Vanbiesbrouck (born September 4, 1963 in Detroit, Michigan) is an American retired professional ice hockey goaltender, who was inducted into the United States Hockey Hall of Fame in 2007. He's played for the New York Rangers, Florida Panthers, Philadelphia Flyers, New York Islanders, and New Jersey Devils. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Audio Life Story & Transcript Category:1963 births Category:Central Professional Hockey League players Category:Florida Panthers players Category:Living people Category:New Jersey Devils players Category:New York Rangers players Category:Ontario Hockey League players Category:Philadelphia Flyers players Category:Sportspeople from Detroit Category:Vezina Trophy winners Category:American ice hockey goaltenders
title: John Vanbiesbrouck
